name: Zero

biography.description: Zero uses the Argus Launcher to deploy cameras that can surveil both sides of breakable and reinforced surfaces, providing intel and disrupting defender setups.

gameplayTips: Use the Argus Launcher to gather intel on enemy positions and setups.
Take advantage of the cameras' ability to shoot a single laser to destroy defender gadgets.
Coordinate with teammates to maximize the tactical advantage of your intel.
